text:
Contact Us | Women's Resource Center (WRC)| UC Riverside 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Due to the impact of COVID-19, our Ethnic & Gender campus locations are closed until further notice. Our staff is working remotely and available to support you along your Highlander journey. We look forward to being back on campus and supporting you in-person. Please continue to wash your hands, wear a face covering, and maintain physical distance.

 Contact Us 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Contact Us 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Women's Resource Center (WRC) is operated by a dedicated staff and team of student volunteers committed to furthering the center's mission and serving the campus community. Stop by 260 Costo Hall to meet us or call us at (951) 827-3337 and discover your place at the WRC. 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Department Information 
 
   
 Women's Resource Center 
 Office Hours: 
Monday-Friday, 8 a.m. – 5 p.m. 
 Phone: (951) 827-3337 
 260 Costo Hall  Riverside, CA. 92521 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Contact Form 
 
 Comment/Question 
 If you have any questions about our department, how to get involved and/or any other general interest or comments. Please fill out the form to contact us.
